name: RUN ROOMS
description: First person indie horror. The main character must exit the maze. In the labyrinth, each path is always different. Be careful when you open doors and take the keys ...
minimum_requirements: OS: 32-64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Celeron N2830 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1500 MB available space
